I take a seat on the edge of the pool, and lean over to peer into the reflective water below. The longer I concentrate on the shapes in the water, the more they change. Colours too faint to see start to deepen, shadows start to twist and form.  Before I know it, my reflection is fading away, and in its place... I see _ .
I stood before the desk, unsure where to start my search. After some time, three things catch my eye: _ , _ , and _ .

white: Not having enough money for chicken nuggets.
Getting drunk and setting yourself on fire.
Flirting with your captor instead of running from them.
Portia, decking a guy with a shovel.
The sound of Muriel's chickens clucking.
Rising from the dead as a furry.
Getting burnt by your own doctor.
Burning royalty on their own birthday.
Muriel's boulder-like body blocking your path.
Spending all your life's savings on a romance route.
Choking on your dead husband's ashes.
